auth.title: Log in to your account
auth.verifyEmailDesc: We sent a verification link to your email address. Check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
auth.verifyEmailDescCode: Enter the verification code sent to your email address.
auth.marketingDesc: Manage your projects and tasks from anywhere. Analyze progress and grow your team!

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Don't worry!
resetPassword.desc: Resetting your password is easy. We'll send you a code via email and you'll set a new password in seconds.
resetPassword.successDesc: Check your mailbox. You will be redirected shortly...
resetPassword.descInput: We will send you a 6-digit code to the email address provided, which you will use to reset your password.
resetPassword.newPasswordDesc: Enter the code you received via email and set a new, secure password.
resetPassword.successResetDesc: You can now log in with your new password. You will be redirected shortly...
resetPassword.tip2: Use a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
resetPassword.errorLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

hints.team_selection: Selected event will appear on calendars of all chosen teams.

view_event.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this event?

alerts.select_team: Please select at least one team

day_list.title: Daily Events
day_list.no_events: No events scheduled for this day.

export.title: Calendar Export
export.desc: Export your workspace calendar to PDF or iCal format.
export.sync_desc: Synchronize your schedule with an external calendar – e.g. Google Calendar or Apple Calendar. After adding the link to your chosen calendar, events will update automatically. Keep in mind, however, that changes in the external calendar may be visible with a delay.

error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.loginAfterRegister: Account created, but login failed. Please try logging in.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during registration

hero.title: Comprehensive
hero.desc: Simplify meetings, manage projects efficiently and optimize workflow - all in one place.

tasks.title: Efficient task management
tasks.desc: Organize, prioritize and track progress with precise tools.

calendar.title: Stay up to date
calendar.subtitle: Stay up to date
calendar.desc: Sync with calendar to never miss a deadline.

analytics.title: Insightful Analytics
analytics.desc: Detailed reports help measure performance and optimize productivity.

efficiency.title: Unleash efficiency in
efficiency.desc: Plan and organize the entire project from start to finish. Communicate and collaborate with your team.

workflow.title: Improve Workflow
workflow.desc: Simplify project management with intuitive tools.

management.title: Optimize management
management.desc: Prioritize tasks and ensure timely delivery.

team.title: Increase team efficiency
team.desc: Clear goals, streamlined processes and insightful analytics.

progress.title: Monitor progress
progress.desc: Track project progress in real time.

pricing.title: Choose the perfect plan
pricing.desc: Whether you are a freelancer, startup or enterprise - we have a plan for you.

free.name: Free
free.desc: Perfect for small teams to start

faq.title: Have questions?
faq.desc: If you don't find the answer to your question, write to us - we'll be happy to help.

q1.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no hidden fees or penalties for early termination.

q2.question: How to install the software?
q2.answer: Zadano.app works in the browser - just register and you can start using it right away. No installation required.

q3.question: Can I start for free?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Our Free plan is free forever and includes all the basic features needed for project management.

q4.question: What integrations are available?
q4.answer: We support integrations with over 50 tools, including Slack, GitHub, Jira, Notion, Google Drive and much more.

cta.title: Simplify your workflow with
cta.desc: Start for free and see why thousands of teams chose Zadano.app as their project management tool.

footer.desc: Manage projects more efficiently with tools designed for your team.
footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest news and tips.

security.title: Workspace Security
security.subtitle: Manage encryption and security keys.
security.encryptionDesc: Messages in this workspace are encrypted with RSA/AES keys. Key rotation increases security without losing access to history.
security.success: Successfully rotated keys and re-encrypted {{count}} messages.
security.confirmRotate: Are you sure you want to rotate keys? All messages will be re-encrypted with a new key. This may take a moment depending on the number of messages.

general.logo_save_error: Failed to save logo in database.
general.logo_type_error: Please select an image file (PNG, JPG, SVG).
general.upload_error: An error occurred while uploading the file.
general.logo_hint: Recommended format: 512x512px, PNG or SVG. Max 2MB.

members.title: Members
members.subtitle: Manage access to organization
members.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from organization?
members.set_owner_confirm: Are you sure you want to hand over the Owner role? This action is irreversible.
members.suspend_confirm: Are you sure you want to suspend this member?
members.activate_confirm: Are you sure you want to activate this member?

labels.title: Labels
labels.subtitle: Manage labels for the entire workspace. Changes will be visible globally.
labels.no_labels: No labels. Create the first label below.
labels.delete_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete label "{{name}}"?

Note: Deleting a label will not remove it from existing tasks.
labels.tip_content: Changes to label colors and names will be immediately visible across all tasks and projects using these labels.

defaults.priorities_subtitle: Customize priority levels for tasks in the workspace

test_panel.title: Test Webhook
test_panel.subtitle: Send sample event
test_panel.description: This tool will send a test event <1>webhook.test</1> to the configured URL. This allows you to verify if your server correctly receives and processes requests.

webhook_modal.silent_mode_description: Messages will not send push notifications

twoFactor.securityDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
twoFactor.disableDescription: Enter your password to disable two-factor authentication.

twoFactor.authenticatorAppDescription: Secure your account with Google Authenticator or Authy.
twoFactor.scanCode: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app
twoFactor.enterCode: Enter the code from your app
twoFactor.backupCodesDesc: Keep these codes safe. You can use them to recover access to your account.
